title: Blood Choice
description: When David is expelled from his city for unintentionally aiding a vampire, he assumes his life is over. Outside the protection of the light barriers he is defenceless to the vampires that have laid waste to human civilisation. However he is rescued by the very same vampire he aided, and he slowly comes to realise that he may be able to make a difference in the uneven war between vampires and humans. All it takes is a choice...
author: Stephanie Park
